title: How to Make Parsley Pesto

steps.headline: Use a food processor to process the blanched almonds to a fine consistency.
Add the parsley, garlic, salt and grated cheese to the processed mixture.
steps.description: Process again until the new ingredients are chopped up roughly.

steps.headline: Keep processing and gradually add the olive oil.
steps.description: Aim for a consistency that is well combined but still retains a good texture.

steps.headline: Remove from the processor and use immediately.
steps.description: Alternatively, store in clean jars and refrigerate. This pesto will keep for a week or two under refrigeration.

text: Use a food processor to process the blanched almonds to a fine consistency.  Add the parsley, garlic, salt and grated cheese to the processed mixture. Process again until the new ingredients are chopped up roughly. Keep processing and gradually add the olive oil. Aim for a consistency that is well combined but still retains a good texture. Remove from the processor and use immediately. Alternatively, store in clean jars and refrigerate. This pesto will keep for a week or two under refrigeration.
